definition: to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: The community's electronic eye has left the thieves nowhere to hide.
sentences.chinese: 社区电子眼，令小偷小摸无处遁形。

sentences.english: Their goal is to serve me a relevant ad everywhere I am.
sentences.chinese: 他们的目标是无处不在的为我提供相关的广告。

sentences.english: That's how schoolyard bullies run playgrounds and global godfathers do it everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 这就是校园欺负运行操场和全球教父做到无处不在。

sentences.english: Then again, Facebook is a real-name business, not a place for dissidents to go into hiding.
sentences.chinese: 而且脸谱网是实名业务，让异见者无处藏身。

sentences.english: Everything from prothetic limbs to pre-fabricated houses will be made using similar printing technology.
sentences.chinese: 从医用假肢到预制房屋，3D打印技术可谓无处不在。

sentences.english: Tiny games came out of nowhere to steal our hearts.
sentences.chinese: 小小的游戏从无处可偷我们的心。

sentences.english: The music is all around us, all you have to do, is listening.
sentences.chinese: 只要倾耳聆听，音乐便无处不在。

sentences.english: The role is really supposed to be omnipotent and omnipresent.
sentences.chinese: 这个角色无处不在，无所不能。

sentences.english: And fate can find you anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 而在命运面前，你无处藏身。

sentences.english: Stepmother should have fresh fish, the weather is cold freezing, nowhere is bought.
sentences.chinese: 继母要吃鲜鱼，天寒冰冻，无处购买。

sentences.english: They live inside the wire, in the middle of nowhere, separated from the civilian population.
sentences.chinese: 他们生活在铁丝网内，无处可藏，与平民百姓隔离。

sentences.english: SECOND NAZARENE: He is in every place my lord but it is hard to find Him.
sentences.chinese: 陛下，这个人无处不在，要找到他，太难了。

sentences.english: While the soft link is still there, it has nowhere to go.
sentences.chinese: 软式联结仍然在那里，不过它有无处去。

sentences.english: But oh, that magic feeling, nowhere to go.
sentences.chinese: 但是，唉，那巧妙的觉得，无处可去。

sentences.english: For if that first covenant had been faultless, then should no place have been sought for the second.
sentences.chinese: 那前约若没有瑕疵，就无处寻求后约了。

sentences.english: Do listen to Huayu near railing, height of nowhere a cold spell.
sentences.chinese: 莫近栏干听花雨，楼高无处着春寒。

definition: to drain (by leading off water)/to unburden oneself/to divulge/to leak a secret
not to have access/beyond one's authority or capability/sth one has no way of doing
a hero with no chance of using his might/to have no opportunity to display one's talents
pinyin: ying1 xiong2 wu2 yong4 wu3 zhi1 di4

definition: to divert oneself from (loneliness, grief etc)/to dispel (negative thoughts etc)
